lead_paragraph: Hong Kong bankers are charging the lowest fees on record to arrange initial public offerings as firms vie for deals in a market where I.P.O.s are raising more than in the United States and Britain combined, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: Hong Kong bankers are charging the lowest fees on record to arrange initial public offerings as firms vie for deals in a market where I.P.O.s are raising more than in the United States and United Kingdom combined.

headline.main: Hong Kong Sees Record Discounts on I.P.O. Fees

abstract: Hong Kong bankers are charging the lowest fees on record to arrange initial public offerings as firms vie for deals in a market where I.P.O.s are raising more than in the United States and United Kingdom combined.
